snippet: Russell, a rookie shortstop, will be replaced by Javier Baez, and Jon Lester will start for Chicago in Game 1 on Saturday.
abstract: Chicago Cubs pitcher Jon Lester will start Game 1 of National League Championship series; shortstop Javier Baez will replace Addison Russell, who is out with injury; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Russell, a rookie shortstop, will be replaced by Javier Baez, and Jon Lester will start for Chicago in Game 1 on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Baseball; Cubs’ Russell Is Sidelined
headline.main: Cubs’ Addison Russell Expected to Miss N.L.C.S. With Hamstring Injury
